Description: As a new visitor, I want to register an account, so that I can securely make purchases and track my orders.
As a registered user, I want to log in, so that I can access my account and previous orders.
As a logged-in user, I want to log out, so that I can keep my account secure when I leave.
As a shopper, I want to select a category and add a product to my cart, so that I can purchase items from my preferred category.
As a shopper, I want to remove products from my cart, so that I only purchase the items I need.
As a shopper, I want to update the quantity of products in my cart, so that I can adjust my order before checkout.
